src:
Johnson's Brexit could rule out US trade deal, Trump tells Farage - video
01 Nov 2019, 09:00 by LBC



Donald Trump has said Boris Johnson's Brexit deal could prevent the UK from striking a trade deal with the US. Speaking to Nigel Farage on LBC Radio, the president said the US 'can't make a deal with the UK' under 'certain aspects of the deal', despite Johnson's claim that it would allow Britain to have an independent trade policy


Trump says Johnson's Brexit could rule out US trade deal
